title: APPLET 1 - BASIC EVENTS
description: This application contains the basic implementation of DOM events.

title: APPLET 2 - LEAFLET MAP
description: This application contains the basic web map.

title: APPLET 3 - EVENT LOGGER
description: This shows the logs with the date and total number of logs.

title: APPLET 4 - DYNAMIC ELEMENTS
description: Dynamically displays a list of students with real-time search functionality.

title: APPLET 5 - OPEN WEATHER
description: Dynamically fetches and displays weather information for a specified city or user's location, utilizing the OpenWeatherMap API for real-time data updates.
